name: Evolution Duck
description:
How is evolution made? Is it an accident? Of course not! It is the result of some legendary duck battles! Want to be part of this incredible process? Then welcome to Evolution Duck!

Fight other ducks, collect food, evolve, and prove you can be better than anyone else in the world!

But first, let's begin from the basics:

The controls.

To move during battle, and trough the menu, use:

'W' to move up.

'A' to move left. 

'S' to move down. 

'D' to move right.

But, this is not enough, because you have to fight back the other ducks. For this, you can use:

'Space'

and see how skilled you are.

Good luck!
